backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining product list, order types, and query/update methods with in-memory product data and an orders map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a home‑page text update to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files covering routing, state, components, styles, and utilities.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment file allowing optional override of the public site URL.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for Home, About, Products, and Contact using AppShell layout.
frontend/src/components/cart/CartLineIte: Renders a cart item row with quantity controls and a remove button, without price display.
frontend/src/components/cart/StickyCartB: Placeholder component returning null since cart button was removed.
frontend/src/components/checkout/Checkou: Checkout form handling customer fields, validation, and submit behavior.
frontend/src/components/checkout/OrderSu: Summarizes cart items and selected shipping country without currency values.
frontend/src/components/contact/Floating: Floating WhatsApp action button linking to a generated WhatsApp URL.
frontend/src/components/contact/WhatsApp: Standard WhatsApp button using shared URL utility and copy text.
Layout wrapper providing header, footer, outlet, and floating WhatsApp button.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders site footer with logo, contact info, Instagram link, and copyright text.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Provides responsive site header with navigation links, logo, and publish/share dialog support.
frontend/src/components/media/Responsive: Simple wrapper component for lazy-loaded responsive images.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Displays a product with image, category label, description, and a WhatsApp contact button.
frontend/src/components/publish/PublishS: Modal dialog that shows the public site URL and allows copying it with clipboard support.
frontend/src/components/shipping/Interna: Callout box indicating international shipping availability.
frontend/src/components/shipping/Shippin: Shows a styled list of countries the store ships to.
frontend/src/constants/contact.ts: Centralized contact details including phone, email, and Instagram info.
frontend/src/constants/copy.ts: Text constants for navigation, shipping, checkout, footer, and publish features.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, including login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching products, product details, orders, and placing orders with filtering and deduping logic for products.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes with global styling rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page describing heritage, quality, and international reach with styled content sections.
frontend/src/pages/CartCheckoutPage.tsx: Placeholder component returning null for a removed cart/checkout feature.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact details, social links, WhatsApp button, and business hours using constants and icons.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page with hero section, product highlights, CTAs, and international shipping components.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays filtered product list with loading and error states and a grid of ProductCard components.
frontend/src/state/cart/CartContext.tsx: Implements cart state with add, update, remove, and persistence in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/state/cart/cartSelectors.ts: Utility functions to compute cart line totals and subtotal.
frontend/src/utils/publicUrl.ts: Resolves the public site URL with environment variable override and production safeguards.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Builds a WhatsApp message URL using contact info and optional custom message.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, container settings, and includes typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s schema, current state, known issues, and existing features, noting the shift away from cart/checkout and deployment/contact-related problems.
